title: Multiple Return Values | Challenge
description: In Go, functions can return multiple values. This feature is commonly used to return both a result and an error value from a function.

meta.title: Go Programming | Multiple Return Values
meta.description: Learn how to use multiple return values in Go programming language. Discover the power of returning both a result and an error from a function.
meta.keywords: Go programming, multiple return values, error handling, function return, programming tutorial

verify.name: Verify Go Run Multiple Return Values
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.description: 在Go语言中，函数可以返回多个值。此功能通常用于从函数中同时返回一个结果和一个错误值。

meta.description: 学习如何在Go编程语言中使用多个返回值。探索从函数中同时返回结果和错误的强大功能。
meta.keywords: Go编程, 多个返回值, 错误处理, 函数返回, 编程教程
